ThingDef.label: cured hive confections
ThingDef.description:
Cured hive confections are a rare delicacy crafted from rich insect jelly, carefully preserved and sweetened until it develops a crystalline, candy-like texture.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 confections requires 20 insect jelly with a total value of 160, and sells for 30, giving a <color=#33CC33>46.67%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 850 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.35</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.025 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>1200</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Hard to estimate as it will depend on your source of insect jelly!
